aircraft.value: Skyhawk Fighter - AC-6307-467 at Forward Operating Base-3

defect_observed.value: Mission computer processing delay. Malfunction reported by flight crew.

root_cause.value: Software algorithm error in control logic implementation

findings.value: Detailed investigation conducted on the defective Communication Suite component. Functional testing confirmed the reported anomaly.

corrective_action.value: Clean and re-lubricate affected assemblies per technical manual

preventive_action.value: Introduce protective coating to prevent environmental degradation

remarks_investigation.value: Thorough investigation completed. Preventive actions recommended.

remarks_design.value: Technical evaluation completed. Proposed preventive measures are appropriate and align with design intent. Date: 14/11/2023 Authorized Signatory of Design: Gp Capt V.S. Pillai

remarks_quality.value: Dept. Component inspection records verified. All quality parameters were within acceptable limits during manufacturing. Date: 16/11/2023 Signature: Wg Cdr B.P. Gupta

remarks_user.value: (Project):(if applicable) Operational history analyzed. No abnormal usage patterns identified. Agree with proposed corrective actions. Date: 17/11/2023 Signature: Sqn Ldr V.K. Patel

remarks_ordaqa.value: (Quality Aspects) Quality oversight review completed. Recommend monitoring effectiveness of implemented preventive actions. Date: 21/11/2023 Signature: Sqn Ldr H.S. Bhatia

remarks_cemilac.value: / RCMA (Design Aspects) From regulatory standpoint, investigation meets required standards. Approve proposed corrective actions. Date: 22/11/2023 Signature: Sqn Ldr A.R. Desai

--- Page 2 (pdf_text) ---
Centre for Military Airworthiness and Certification
FORM - 44
DEFECT INVESTIGATION REPORT FORMAT
Part - III: (Defect Details)
a) Defect Category: Mission Critical
b) Defect Observed: Mission computer processing delay. Malfunction reported by flight crew.
Part IV: Investigation: (Details of Examination including previous similar Defects)
a) Root Cause Analysis: Software algorithm error in control logic implementation
b) Findings / Conclusions: Detailed investigation conducted on the defective Communication Suite component.
Functional testing confirmed the reported anomaly.
c) Remedial Measures Clean and re-lubricate affected assemblies per technical manual
i. Corrective Action:
ii. Preventive Action: Introduce protective coating to prevent environmental degradation
d) Attributable Code: N1 - Defect confirmed but reason not establish...
